main.name: Arshad Sacoor
main.description: I am a final year student at The University of Pretoria and currently completing a degree in BSc Computer Science
main.bio: I am adaptable, reliable and have good time management skills. I am very keen to learn new programming technologies. My interests are software engineering, artificial intelligence, web development and user interface development. I have experience with programming languages such Java, C++, Python and SQL. I have also previously used Cloud services such as Amazon AWS and Microsoft Azure
